casebody.data:
Robert McC. MARSH, as Receiver of the ABCO Boiler Corporation, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. SALTSER & WEINSIER, Inc., Defendant-Appellant. No. 218. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 7, 1930. *1013Joseph Katz, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellant.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
